about_the_game:
Story about how he earned a suite from T-Financial Platform in four months.

You are an ordinary person who has just inherited 600000 yuan.
By chance, you heard a friend recommend a perfect financial management platform - T-financial.
Invest 120 days with the principal of 600000 yuan.
Your ultimate goal is to earn 200000 yuan to buy a suburban house and enjoy the ending when the time is right.

Welcome. Welcome to T-Fanancial.
All characters appearing in this work are fictitious. Any resemblance to real persons, living or dead, is purely coincidental.

---Features:
Financial products updated every day
The activity funds put in T-financial wallet will also get income every day!
Real(?) mobile screen experience
Designed plot and various endings
